description: Number of divisors of n such that n and n+1 have the same sum of divisors.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..4804
mathematica: Reap[ Do[ If[ DivisorSigma[1, n] == DivisorSigma[1, n + 1], tau = DivisorSigma[0, n]; Print[{n, tau}]; Sow[tau]], {n, 1, 4*10^6}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 08 2012 *)DivisorSigma[0,#]&/@Flatten[Position[Partition[DivisorSigma[1,Range[ 4000000]],2,1], _?(First[#] == Last[#]&),{1},Heads->False]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 04 2014 *)
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Jan 11, 2000
